messages.text: Hey! I saw you're into hiking. What's your favorite trail?
Oh cool! I love the trails around Bear Mountain. Been there?

suggestions: Great opener! You referenced their interest and asked an engaging question.
They're showing genuine interest with detailed response and counter-question.
Perfect time to suggest meeting up for a hiking adventure.
Generic opener received generic response - try referencing their profile.
Low engagement detected. Consider asking about their work or interests.
Response time was 30 minutes - they might be busy or not very interested.

tips: Your main photo should be a clear, high-quality headshot with a genuine smile
Include at least one full-body photo to give a complete picture
Show your hobbies and interests through activity photos
Avoid group photos where you're hard to identify
Keep it concise but informative - aim for 3-4 sentences
Include conversation starters like hobbies or interesting facts
Show your personality through humor or unique perspectives
End with a question or call-to-action to encourage messages

testimonials.name: Alex
testimonials.text: I went from zero dates to 3 meaningful relationships in 6 months. The conversation analysis completely changed how I communicate on dating apps.

testimonials.name: Sarah
testimonials.text: After my divorce, I was terrified of dating again. The confidence-building tips and date prep simulator gave me the courage to put myself out there.

testimonials.name: Marcus
testimonials.text: The profile optimization alone got me 5x more matches. But the real game-changer was learning how to turn those matches into actual dates.

daily_tips: Start conversations by referencing something specific from their profile
Ask open-ended questions that invite detailed responses
Share something interesting about yourself to build connection
Use humor appropriately to show your personality
Don't take too long to suggest meeting up if the conversation is going well
conversation_starters: I noticed you're into [hobby]. What got you started with that?
Your photo at [location] looks amazing! What's the story behind it?
I saw you mentioned [interest]. I've been wanting to try that - any tips for a beginner?
Your [pet/hobby/job] sounds really interesting. What's the best part about it?
I love that you're into [shared interest]. What's your favorite [related activity]?

goals: Have 3 meaningful conversations lasting more than 10 messages
Ask for at least 1 phone number or date
Update profile based on AI feedback
Complete date preparation for upcoming meetings

sample_insights.analysis: Enthusiastic tone with genuine excitement. High interest level detected through vocal inflection and pacing. Recommend responding with equal energy.

topics: Talk about your work without being boring
Discuss shared interests from your profiles
Share a funny or interesting personal story
date_prep_scenarios.conversation_flow: Start light, build connection, find common ground, suggest future plans

topics: Explore each other's values and lifestyle
date_prep_scenarios.conversation_flow: Establish comfort, deepen conversation, show genuine interest, create emotional connection

features: AI profile photo analysis (up to 5 photos)
